title: 9284 Classic Crystal Granite - 180fx® Laminate
cleaned_text: Classic Crystal Granite Swatches are a representation and may vary in color from the final product. Please obtain a sample of the product before making a final selection. Swatch Samples only come in Standard Finishes based on the Product Line. Please contact Customer Service for additional information: 1-800-FORMICA (367-6422). Textures -
